**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

### Tender Details

#### Title
----------------

EH990-231341 Workspaces

#### Reference Number
-------------------

WS3779258770-Doc3815664929

#### Amendment Number
--------------------

2

#### Solicitation Number
------------------------

WS3779258770

#### Tender Status
------------------

*English*: Expired
*Français*: Expiré

### Tender Description
----------------------

This request for proposal (RFP) is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C, covering a requirement from the following Product Categories of the SA:

**Product Categories**

*   Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems (Product Category 1)
*   Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products (Product Category 2)
*   Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets (Product Category 3)
*   Wood Veneer - Freestanding Products (Product Category 4)
*   Ancillary and Lighting Products (Product Category 5)
*   Support Space - Collaborative Furniture (Product Category 6)

The requirement also contains products that are not covered by the Supply Arrangement.

### Tender Objective
--------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office workspaces to Ottawa, Ontario, by July 4, 2023, or before.

### Tender Process
------------------

This RFP will be solicited amidst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).

### Evaluation Criteria
----------------------

The bid will be assessed based on the selection criteria of Lowest Price.

### Deadline for Tender
----------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on January 24, 2023 before 2:00 pm EST.

### Contact Information
------------------------

For further information, kindly contact:

*   Name: Jose Ortiz
*   Email: <jose.ortiz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Organization: Public Services and Procurement Canada
